DOC.brief_summary: Prospective randomize clinical trial compare two method intra-operative tensioning retropubic midurethral sling stress urinary incontinence . Primary outcome rate abnormal bladder function . Secondary outcome include validate quality life score , physical exam finding , rate immediate post operative voiding dysfunction .
DOC.criteria: Age 18 old Women elect surgical management symptomatic urinary incontinence Ability read & write English Other prolapse surgery time sling placement allow Must consent participation trial Women prior incontinence procedure Clinically obvious , nonsymptomatic stress urinary incontinence ( latent stress incontinence ) Declines participation trial Women exist urinary retention significant overactive bladder ( require medication )
